name: Miguel Rodriguez
quote: Sarah's personalized approach transformed my business English skills. In just three months, I gained the confidence to lead international meetings and negotiate with clients. Her focus on practical, real-world language has been invaluable for my career.

name: Thomas Weber
quote: The group workshops were an excellent way to practice conversational English in a relaxed environment. I not only improved my technical English for work but also made friends with other professionals. Great value for the price!

quote: Sarah's teaching goes beyond just language - she helped me understand cultural nuances crucial for international business communication. Her feedback on my presentation skills was particularly helpful, and I now feel much more confident in client meetings.
